viewData.name: Samsung J5200 49" Class Full HD Smart Multi-System LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung J5200 49" Class Full HD Smart Multi-System LED TV featuring Multi-System Compatible, Full HD 1920 x 1080 LED Panel Motion Rate 50 for Smooth Motion. Review Samsung J5200
viewData.long_description: View content at resolutions up to 1080p across PAL, NTSC, and SECAM color systems with the Samsung J5200 49" Class Full HD Smart Multi-System LED TV. This TV has a 49" LED-backlit LCD display and incorporates Motion Rate 50 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur.The J5200 has built-in Wi-Fi connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content via the Samsung Smart Hub, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. With two HDMI inputs, you can connect your digital high-definition video sources. Two USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
